sequence.__comment__: Top layer without surface depth, above 61 without stone depth: Wintry and volcanoe surface decorations.

then_run.__comment__: Wintry forest and lowlands grass block decorations

sequence.__comment__: Top layer with surface depth, above 61 with stone depth: Shrubland, glacial chasm, frozen cliffs, frozen ocean deocrations.
Rocky Mountains surface decorations, no specific layer, can be underground.
Top layer without surface depth, under water -1: General top layer placements.
Default grass block placement. Place dirt if underwater.
Top layer without surface depth, under water -6, surface depth multiplier -1: Frozen oceans holes.
Top layer with surface depth, under water -6, surface depth multiplier -1: General soil layer placement.
Beach and desert: add sandstone for 15 depth
Top layer: add some gravels peaks
